item.title: ICOM6045 Communication Network Security
item.description: Introduction Communication network definition an infrastructure for exchanging information in electronic form a physical infrastructure: communication links (e.g., wires and cables) a logical infrastructure: protocols types of information voice documents photos video, etc types of communication network a public switched telephone network (circuit switching, lots of switches in the telephone network, single line, more expensive) a mobile telephone network the Internet (packet switching, sharing, much cheaper) a communication infrastructure (i.
